document.full_text: bank of america corp  is expected to report a 9 percent drop in its first quarter profit, as u.s. consumer lending contracts and the costs for collecting on mortgages continue to rise.
document.title: bofa expected to beat street, but mortgage costs loom
lines_and_colors: bank of america corp  is expected to report a 9 percent drop in its first quarter profit, as u.s. consumer lending contracts and the costs for collecting on mortgages continue to rise.
